description: We at JKase , always listening , and we made improvement. Due to customer suggestions, we have redesigned the Kindle 4 case to make the "down button key" easier accessible compare to the "old version" of JKase.This flip case for Amazon Kindle Wi-Fi 6" E Ink Display protects your Kindle from bumps and scratches, keeping your ebook reader looking new and working great. With a slim, good-looking design, this soft and durable case keeps your Kindle Wi-Fi 6" E Ink Display protected during your travels while minimizing additional bulk and weight for easy portability.
